name: Lightseekers
description:
Epic battles await you in the multi-award winning Trading Card Game, now on Steam.
Battle with digital cards and scan tabletop cards into your digital collection for Double the Value!

Collect and trade cards to become the ultimate hero of Tantos.
With hundreds of cards available, each deck is unique and represents your own play-style.
Start your legend today!

  • FAST, TACTICAL GAMEPLAY – easy to play, takes skill to master.
  • CARDS with INGENIOUS EVOLVING BUFFS for damage and healing over time.
  • CHOOSE YOUR HERO from over 100 in six different classes, to match your own play style.
  • DISCOVER the magical WORLD of TANTOS, mythology and breath-taking imagery.
  • MASTER powerful combo cards and multiple orders.
  • DESIGN YOUR DECK - using 1 hero, 5 combo, and 30 action cards.
  • GET DOUBLE THE VALUE – Scan* tabletop cards into your digital collection to play them online for free!

Are you ready to prove your skill?

*Scanning tabletop cards requires account link to internet-enabled mobile device with camera.
